Html:
Hi Guys any one Give me sample code of Playing .gsm and .dss files.

Thanks in advance.

NAudio does not have any built-in support for these file formats. However, it does allow you access to any codecs on your machine, which should include a GSM one, so you may still be able to play the audio if you can extract the payload from the file

Hi markheath,

Can u give me a sample for how to add codec in naudio. because I m having the codec for dss file.

Thanks in advance.
Well it depends a lot on what sort of codec it is - ACM, Media Foundation, executable etc. See my article on CodeProject on converting audio between formats for more info
